name: The crest of the hive
data: It increases the users constitution somewhat.
It increases the users wisdom a bit.
It increases the users intelligence a bit.
It decreases the users charisma impressively.
It has average armour class for its type (poor in general).
It increases the users hitpoints poorly.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a bit.
It increases the users physical resistance adequately.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
